overview:
Jordan grew up in Amherst, NY, a suburb just outside the city of Buffalo. He is one of nine children and loves having a big family. Jordan took an interest in entrepreneurship at an early age, creating several success businesses and ecommerce sites while in his early teens. After college Jordan moved to Budapest where he worked for a large consumer good distribution company. One night, while out and about in Budapest, Jordan met Higher Click founders Mark Webster and Gael Breton in a bar. It wasn’t long before Jordan agreed to join the growing Higher Click team as Business Development Manager

Outside of work, Jordan enjoys playing tennis with his friends whenever he gets the opportunity. In his free time, aside from to pretending to know was he is doing in the kitchen as a novice chef, Jordan enjoys zealously rooting for the Buffalo Bills. He’s also known to enjoy the occasional glass of Jack Daniels on ice. You can follow Jordan online at http://jordanfried.com
